blue.lapis.common.command

Interface CommandContext<S extends CommandSource>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandContextImpl

    public interface CommandContext<S extends CommandSource>
    Represents the environment in which a command has been called; its CommandConfiguration, its CommandSource, parsed arguments, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • getSource

        Returns:
        the CommandSource which this command was issued from

      • getLine

        Returns:
        the entire line of text entered, except for the portion recognized as the command

      • getTokens

        Returns:
        the tokens in String format, as determined by the Tokenizer for this command

      • get
